hero.heading: Welcome to Donna Vino, your unique wine experience.
hero.paragraph: Discover unique wine stories told by your sommelier while your private chef customizes the menu.
pcard.big-left.heading: Wine tasting with dinner
pcard.big-left.paragraph: Experience an unforgettable Italian wine dinner guided by sommelier Katrine Giorgio. Discover rare wines paired with antipasti, pasta, and dessert prepared by our chef Riccardo Lara.
pcard.big-right.heading: Wine tasting with dinner for companies
pcard.big-right.paragraph: Strengthen team bonds with a tailored Italian wine tasting experience. Perfect for team building, networking, or a relaxing evening with dinner.
pcard.small-left.heading: Our Team
pcard.small-left.paragraph: Meet our team—passionate, balanced, and full-bodied, like a fine wine. Click below to discover the people behind our exceptional tastings and selections.
pcard.small-right.heading: Our Values
pcard.small-right.paragraph: Our values blend sustainability, natural methods, and craftsmanship—creating wines with authenticity and character. Click below to explore the principles behind every bottle we offer.
subscribe.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter
subscribe.paragraph: Stay up to date with the latest news related to Donna Vino and our popular wine tastings in the Copenhagen area.
subscribe.terms: I agree with the terms and conditions for subscribing to the newsletter
values.heading: Donna Vino Values
values.p2: Your destination for authentic Italian flavours.
values.p3: Donna Vino is the result of former Michelin sommelier Katrine Giorgio's passion for unique Italian wine. The vision is to provide guests with unique Italian flavours and the opportunity to discover wines from passionate winemakers who prioritise sustainable production. Unique flavours and sustainability go hand in hand for several reasons.
thematic.p1-start: Sustainably farmed vineyards prioritize healthy soil and a thriving ecosystem, fostering biodiversity that enhances the quality and character of the grapes
thematic.p1-end: . This meticulous approach to farming not only protects the environment but also allows the wines to authentically reflect the unique terroir in which they are cultivated. The result is a distinctive flavor profile that captures the essence of the land, offering a true expression of its climate, soil composition, and natural surroundings. By choosing sustainably produced wines, you support practices that prioritize long-term environmental stewardship while enjoying exceptional wines crafted with care and respect for nature.
thematic.p2-start: A meticulous approach to every step of the winemaking process, from vineyard to bottle, ensures a richer flavor profile, greater complexity, and unique
thematic.p2-end: characteristics that reflect both the terroir and the winemaker's distinct style. This dedication begins with careful cultivation of the vines, fostering healthy grapes that embody the essence of the land. It continues through precise harvesting, fermentation, and aging techniques, each tailored to enhance the wine’s natural qualities. The result is a harmonious blend of tradition, craftsmanship, and innovation, delivering wines that tell a story of their origin while showcasing the artistry of the winemaker.
thematic.p3-start: The use of natural yeast strains, naturally present on the grapes and within the winery, rather than commercial yeast strains
thematic.p3-end: , plays a pivotal role in creating wines with a distinctive character. This approach not only enhances the authenticity of the winemaking process but also contributes to a broader spectrum of aromas and flavor profiles. By embracing the wild yeasts native to the vineyard and cellar environment, winemakers allow the unique terroir to shine through, capturing the subtle nuances of the region’s soil, climate, and grape variety. This commitment to natural fermentation results in wines that are complex, expressive, and deeply rooted in their origin, offering a true reflection of nature’s influence and the artistry of the winemaker.
thematic.p4-start: The winemakers prioritize a minimalist approach, allowing the grapes and the unique qualities of the vineyard to take center stage
thematic.p4-end: . By avoiding excessive manipulation, additives, or chemicals, they craft wines that reflect the true essence of their origin. The result is a genuine and authentic flavor profile, showcasing the purity of the fruit and the natural character of the terroir. This commitment to letting nature lead creates wines that are both expressive and harmonious, offering an honest representation of the vineyard's identity.
team.heading: Our Awesome Team
team.paragraph: Our team is as unique and vibrant as the wines we share, blending passion, expertise, and dedication to craft unforgettable experiences for you.
